20110121190117.000|20110121190118.000|CC1|TRAGIC ACCIDENT.

20110121190138.000|20110121190139.000|CC1|BAXTER HEALTHCARE FACILITY.     
20110121190139.000|20110121190141.000|CC1|INSIDE THEY FOUND THREE WORKERS 
20110121190141.000|20110121190142.000|CC1|OVERCOME BY FUMES.

20110121190145.000|20110121190146.000|CC1|HALLWAY NOT BREATHING.

20110121190152.000|20110121190153.000|CC1|THE OTHER TWO WORKERS.

20110121190155.000|20110121190157.000|CC1|FROM AN EMPTY TANK.

20110121190158.000|20110121190204.000|CC1|HOLDS BLOOD AND ETHANOL IS USED

20110121190207.000|20110121190207.000|CC1|PLASMA.

20110121190401.000|20110121190404.000|CC1|GUN ON TO A SCHOOL ZONE AND THE 
20110121190404.000|20110121190406.000|CC1|OTHER FOR FIRING A WEAPON IN A
